message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.AI 

Reasoning: 
- cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely category as the paper deals with natural language processing and text analysis of online user reviews. 
- cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is also likely as the paper discusses methods for automatically mining product opinions from the web. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning) is relevant as the paper proposes extensions to standard topic modeling methods. 
- cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) could be relevant as the paper deals with analyzing user-generated content on the web. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is less likely but still possible as the paper proposes a novel framework for extracting ratable aspects from online user reviews.
